snippet: In the first chapter of his book "Why I Left Goldman Sachs, A Wall Street Story," Greg Smith, a former salesman for the Wall Street firm, writes of interns who had to carry a stool with them.
abstract: In the first chapter of his book "Why I Left Goldman Sachs, A Wall Street Story," Greg Smith, a former salesman for the Wall Street firm, writes of interns who had to carry a stool with them.

headline.main: Book by Disgruntled Ex-Salesman Offers His Analysis of the Culture at Goldman
headline.print_headline: Book by Disgruntled Ex-Salesman Offers His Analysis of the Culture at Goldman
